title: Minami-ke Okawari
opening_song: "Kokoro no Tsubasa (ココロノツバサ)" by Rina Satou, Marina Inoue & Minori Chihara
ending_song: "Sono Koe ga Kiki Takute (その声が聞きたくて)" by Rina Satou, Marina Inoue & Minori Chihara
sinopse: The second season of Minami-Ke. It picks up where the first season left off, and just like the first season, it's about the daily lives of the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana and Chiaki, and their school friends.
